name: Deal Your Dice
description:
Deal your dice to the parameters and defeat waves of enemies! The dice number will decrease when you take damage, so you have to make decisions on how to allocate dice.

Tips: You can make a Dice 6 by taking damage from 10.

Controls

ESC: Open/Close Dice Window

WASD: Move

Mouse: Aim and shoot

Space: Dash(You should) or Turn on switch

R: Reload

How To Play

1. When enter the game, you should press the ESC button to open the dice window.

2. You could move your dice to the frame along abilities.

3. When all is ready, turn on the switch in the center of the room, add enemies will be spawned. BATTLE START

LUCK is a parameter which decreases the possibility of blank gun.

Sorry for not having time to prepare UI and tutorial which I wanted to do at the bottom room.
